related_questions.question:
5. i saw an accident last night. somebody ……..an ambulance but nobody …… so the ambulance ………..    a. called – was injured – wasn’t needed
b. called – injured – didn’t need 
c. was called – was injured – wasn’t needed 
d. called – injured – wasn’t needed

answers.answer:
Jawaban:

A) Called - Was Injured - Wasn't Needed

Penjelasan:

I saw an accident last night. Somebody called an ambulance but nobody was injured so the ambulance wasn't needed. (Aku melihat sebuah kecelakaan tadi malam. Seseorang menelepon sebuah ambulans namun tidak ada yang terluka sehingga ambulans tersebut tidak diperlukan)

Karena dia di masa lalu, maka kita gunakan simple past Dan past perfect.

V1 V2 V3

Call Called Called

  • Untuk kesatu, kita gunakan Called karena kalimat tersebut lebih sesuai dengan kata called.
  • Untuk kedua, kita gunakan Was Injured karena pada bagian tersebut lebih logis bila diartikan sebagai "tidak ada yang terluka/nobody was injured" dibandingkan "tidak ada terluka/nobody injured"
  • Untuk ketiga, kita gunakan Wasn't Needed karena artinya adalah tidak diperlukan sedangkan jawaban yang tidak tepat adalah didn't need karena artinya tidak perlu.

Jadi jawaban yang tepat adalah

A) Called - Was Injured - Wasn't Needed

related_questions.question:
Read the following text to answer the q.    Pink Beach
Last holiday I went to Komodo island. There is a gorgeous beach which has pink colored-sand. The
beach is called Pink Beach or Pantai Merah Muda,
Il's a huge beach with a calm wave. When I looked it closely, I could see that it actually an ordinary
white beach sand. But there are a lot of crushed corals and minerals that make it looks pink. Pink beach is a
special beach, There's no one beach in this world has a beautiful pink sand like this.
1. What is the text about?
2. Where is it located ?
3. Why the sand has pink color?
4. Why does the writer think that Pink Beach is a special one?
5.
" ....... It actually an ordinary white beach sand."
What is the Indonesian translation of the underlined word ?​

answers.answer:
1. Pink beach

2. Komodo Island

3. Because a lot of crushed corals and minerals make the sand looks pink

4. because there's no one beach in this world has a beautiful pink sand like that

5. mana kata bergaris bawah nya?

semoga bermanfaat.

1.pink beach

2.in comodo island

3.Because that is a gorgeous beach

4.Because that's beach verry langkah

5.pantai merah.

Penjelasan:

SEMOGA TIDAK MEMBANTU

Our headmaster gave punishment to the students who did not wear uniform

b. Our headmaster gave punishment to the students who didn't wear uniform.
